CustomField.description: A name that combines Parent Name (Thurgood Marshall Tower) and Facility Name (Room 400), for example, Thurgood Marshall Tower - Room 400. If no Parent Facility, Account value is used. If also no Account, Facility Name and Display Name are the same.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(hed__Parent_Facility__c)), hed__Parent_Facility__r.Name + ' - ' + Name, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(hed__Account__c)), hed__Account__r.Name + ' - ' + Name, Name ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A name that combines Parent Name (Thurgood Marshall Tower) and Facility Name (Room 400), for example, Thurgood Marshall Tower - Room 400. If no Parent Facility, Account value is used. If also no Account, Facility Name and Display Name are the same.
CustomField.label: Display Name
